page.title: 04COCKTON HILL INFANTS SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called{Cockton Hill {Infants}School.It was opened on 27th Febuary 1909.In our school we have 176 children,6 teachers,a headmaster,a secretary,a nursery nurse,5 nannies,4 dinner ladies,a caretaker and a cleaner.We have 6 classrooms upstairs and one downstairs.One is used as a T.V and music room.We have a nice playground and a field to play on.The {average family}has 2 children.Most of our children live with their mam and dad in{terraced houses. My name is {Laura Cassie.}I live in a terraced house.I am 7 years old with fair hair.I have a garden, yard and allotment.In my house I have a living room, dining room and kitchen.I have a passage with a hatstand, an attic and a cellar.My sister and I share one bedroom.Mam and dad share the other.I have a cat and a hamster.I have a car.
